text: and anyone who eats any part of its carcass shall wash his garments and be unclean until evening; so also, anyone who carries its carcass shall wash his garments and be unclean until evening.
for Israelite women to go yearly to mourn the daughter of Jephthah the Gileadite for four days of the year.
When Solomon tried to have Jeroboam killed, Jeroboam fled to Shishak, king of Egypt. He remained in Egypt until Solomon’s death.
Ira, from Jattir; Gareb, from Jattir;

Trypho kept urging Imalkue to hand over the boy to him, so that he might succeed his father as king. He told him of all that Demetrius had done and of the hostility his soldiers had for him; and he remained there for many days.
You fools! Did not the maker of the outside also make the inside?
Jesus said to her, “Did I not tell you that if you believe you will see the glory of God?”
God had foreseen something better for us, so that without us they should not be made perfect.
